label: applicableBalanceOut
comment: A balance out applicable to this trade settlement payment monetary summation.
A header balance out applicable to this trade settlement header monetary summation.

rangeIncludes.comment: Offset information to ensure that debits and credits are equal.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of monetary amount totals, specified at header level, for a trade settlement.
A collection of monetary amount totals specified for a trade settlement payment.
